metadata.title: CVE-2019-19272 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in tls_verify_crl in ProFTPD before 1.3.6. Directdereference of a NULL pointer (a variable initialized to NULL) leads to acrash when validating the certificate of a client connecting to the serverin a TLS client/server mutual-authentication setup.

criterions.comment: proftpd-dfsg package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
